channel.title: Jupyter on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Current 22 - Session Analysis with DuckDB and Jupyter Notebook
item.description: At Current 2022 the audience was given the option to submit ratings. Here’s some analysis I’ve done on the raw data. It’s interesting to poke about it, and it also gave me an excuse to try using DuckDB in a notebook!
